author: lutter
msg: Replaced id parameter with opts in client library

author: lutter
msg: Fix requests for URL's with extension and Sinatra 0.9.4
* server.rb: register RespondTo with the application, not Sinatra::Base

author: lutter
msg: With Sinatra 0.9.4, there's no Sinatra::mime_type; use the wrapper method

author: lutter
msg: * do not hardcode production mode by default
* set configuration at the top of server.rb
* in dev mode, make stdout and stderr synchronous
